title: "Different Kinds of Darkness" by David Langford
description: A group of children form a secret society around a mysterious and powerful artifact. This story appears in David Langford's collection DIFFERENT KINDS OF DARKNESS. This episode is brought to you by Audible (audible.com/levar) and Tripping.com (www.tripping.com/LEVAR).
author: originals+lbr@stitcher.com (LeVar Burton and Stitcher)
